chunk:
Herbivore Botanicals Lapis Facial Oil

Brand: Herbivore Botanicals

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Squalane, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Aleurites Moluccanus Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Tanacetum Annuum Flower Oil, Jasminum Sambac (Jasmine) Flower Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Extract, Limonene, Citro

act, Limonene, Citronellol, Linalool, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Eugenol

Directions: Massage2-4 drops into clear skin, making it the last step in your routine. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.
